articles.author: Jenny Brewer
articles.title: Enter the labrynthine universe of surrealist illustrator Dani Choi
articles.description: Born in South Korea and based in Brooklyn, the artist aims to create a feeling of “alienation and separation from the real world” for her viewers.
articles.content: As such, Dani can be seen bringing her knack for narrative to The New York Times, Grazia and Poetry magazine, among other publications, as well as client work for the likes of the New York Ballet, Ha… [+2654 chars]
